results.name: Number T(n,k) of permutations p of [n] with no fixed points where the maximal displacement of an element equals k; triangle T(n,k), n>=0, 0<=k<=n, read by rows.
link: Alois P. Heinz, Rows n = 0..20, flattened
maple: b:= proc(n, s, k) option remember; `if`(n=0, 1, `if`(n+k in s,
mathematica: b[n_, s_, k_] := b[n, s, k] = If[n==0, 1, If[MemberQ[s, n+k], b[n-1, (s ~Complement~ {n+k}) ~Union~ If[n-k>1, {n-k-1}, {}], k], Sum[If[j==n, 0, b[n-1, (s ~Complement~ {j}) ~Union~ If[n-k>1, {n-k-1}, {}], k]], {j, s}]] ];
